Numan, nke a makwaara dị ka Nomweh (nke pụtara 'elu ugwu'), bụ obodo na mpaghara gọọmentị ime obodo na steeti Adamawa, Naijiria
Ọ bụ obodo ọdụ ụgbọ mmiri nke dị na njikọ nke Osimiri Benue na Osimiri Gongola.
Obodo a bụ ebe Adamawa Steeti Polytechnic dị.
Àtụ:LGAs and communities of Adamawa StateGen
Muhammad Almustapha Musa @ New Motor Park, Numan Nigeria (11 Eprel, 2021).
